data.text: @CPenso Hi Chris, I apologize for delay at refunds. The approximate handling time for refund is about 8 weeks at the moment. If you wish us to check the situation for your reservation. Please send reservation code, flight details and email address via DM, so we can take a look./Jaana
@martynlocker Hi, please send us a DM with your booking and contact details, so that we can have a look at your reservation //Mari

data.text: We will fly a repatriation flight from Antalya, Turkey to bring home people from Finland and other Nordic countries. AY7052 leaves on April 29 at 1.05 PM local time. The flight is organised together with @Ulkoministerio. Tickets are now for sale: https://t.co/wLlLjsH4sn

@RoteM42215744 Sehr geehrter Dr. Pfefferle,
Danke für deine Nachricht.
Die erwartete Verzögerung beträgt 8 Wochen.
Da Ihre Anfrage am 23. März wahrscheinlich um den 18. Mai erfolgt.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Lyubo

data.text: @haria_kushal Hello, the current handling time of refund requests is around two months, so you may still need to wait for a few weeks. If you need more details, please DM us the names of the passengers, e-mail address and telephone number on the bookings so we can have a look. / Elli

@RajeevM31361218 Gift voucher can be used to buy flight tickets for flights with Finnair flight number on Finnair website or through our customer service channels. It is valid for one year from issuance. / Elli
@APucheglazov Hi Artem, you can see our traffic plan from here https://t.co/Wvr5OhzTKv  //Roosa

data.text: @IsooAntti Please DM us your booking reference, dates of travel and e-mail address and telephone number on the booking so we can have a look at this. / Elli

@barbieri193 We have replied to your DM about this. Unfortunately the refund department handling times are around two months at the moment so we just have to wait for now. Please DM us if there's anything else we could help you with. / Elli
@ramnathtweets If you still need assistance, please DM us your booking reference, travel dates and names, e-mail address and telephone number on the booking so we can have a look at this. / Elli

data.text: @DidymusBrush I see. Please remember that if you have purchased the ticket directly through our website, you may also be eligible to apply for a refund in from of gift voucher with 10 % more value than the original booking. See the link or DM us for more details https://t.co/oFFK2IPFcB /Elli
@Paul14209148 Hi Paul, unfortunately that flight is cancelled. //Roosa
@haria_kushal Hi, I'm sorry to hear that you haven't been able to reach us. Refund handling takes around 8-10 weeks at the moment.  //Katja
@naveena_hr Hi Naveena, unfortunately Finnair does not have flights from Canada. You cnn check our latest travel updates from here: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X /Keijo

data.text: We regret the delay in the refund processing because of high refund application volumes. Our average handling time is 8 weeks. One faster refund option is a Finnair gift voucher. data.text: @Uhneeka_ We follow actively different authorities and update our policy accordingly. Situation can change a lot before August. If you need further assistance with this, please DM us your booking reference, contact details, travel dates and name so we can have a look. /Elli

@DidymusBrush Hello, Change has to be made prior to original departure time. If you need more assistance with the terms and conditions, please DM us your booking reference, names of the passengers, e-mail address and telephone address on the booking so we can have a look at this. /Elli

data.text: Most planes are now grounded due to the coronavirus pandemic, but Finnair Cargo is keeping the A350 aircraft in the sky by flying food to Asia and medical supplies and electronics back to Europe. Cargo also has a big role in the fight against Covid-19. https://t.co/7jAp3ctv80

Finnair A350 is flying to Estonia this afternoon with a belly full of cargo! Flight AY8851 is landing in Tallinn at 15:50 local time. This is the first time that a Finnair A350 lands at Tallinn airport. #A350 #avgeek https://t.co/NKpoM6J09Z

data.text: @mjhill94210 Hi Matt, I am sorry to hear about this. If you still need help, please send us DM with your booking reference or ticket number as well as the email on your booking, so we can check if there is something we could do. /Keijo

data.text: @MOHITKWATRA1 Hi! You should have full refund due your flights are cancelled, kindly contact to travel agency about this. We don't handle their refund cases. Also, please delete all messages your sent for safety reasons. It's not recommended to send booking details in public message. -Helmi

data.text: @PekarikMartin Hi, could you please send private message (DM) with your booking reference or ticket number as well as the email and phone number on the booking, so I can take a look? - Toni
@KangasluomaL Hei, lähettäisitkö meille yksityisviestinä varausnumerot, matkustajien nimet ja varauksille ilmoitetut yhteystiedot, niin voimme selvittää asiaa. //Mari
@HerraSopuli 2/2 Erilaisten käsittelyprosessien vuoksi lahjakorttihyvitys voidaan käsitellä nopeammin kuin muu takaisinmaksu.//Hanna-Mari

@HerraSopuli Hei! Valitettavasti meillä on tällä hetkellä koronavirustilanteesta johtuen pidemmät jonot maksukortille tai pankkitilille tehtävien hyvitysten, kuin lahjakortille tehtävien hyvitysten https://t.co/CekBt7olazös käsittelyprosessi on erilainen näissä kahdessa. 1/2

@vikankare Hei Ville. Lentoja on myös mahdollista muuttaa, joten varaus ei peruunnu jos lento meidän puolelta perutaan. Varausta voi siis halutessaan muuttaa tai ottaa siitä takaisinmaksun. Matkatoimistojen varauksissa se hoituu matkatoimiston kautta mistä liput on ostettu. //Jukka-Pekka

@FrankErzfeld @BillBillboyd Hi, we currently have a limited service concept due to the coronavirus epidemic. The aim is to limit the contact between the cabin crew and customers. We're sorry for the inconvenience. Heidi / Finnair
